problem.title: CheckPoint: Collision
problem.script:
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
a=lc_random(1,3,1) b=lc_random(1,3,1) c=lc_random(1,3,1) d=lc_random(1,3,1) ma=lc_choose(a,50,60,70) va=lc_choose(b,2.0,3.0,4.0) mb=lc_choose(c,30,40,50) vb=lc_choose(d,0.4,0.8,1.2) v=(- mb* vb+ ma*( va+2.0))/ mb
problem.p: Two skaters, Alan and Betsy, move toward each other on a very smooth skating rink. Their masses and speeds are: $ma kg; $va m/s and $mb kg; $vb m/s. After the skaters collide and use their hands to push each other away, Alan is moving backwards at 2.0 m/s. Taking the direction of Alan's initial velocity as positive, find Betsy's velocity \(v_f\) after the collision.
